etomica.data

Class DataSourceRmsVelocity

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceRmsVelocity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceAtomic, DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, java.io.Serializable

    public class DataSourceRmsVelocity
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource, DataSourceAtomic, DataSourceIndependent, java.io.Serializable
    Meter for the root-mean-square velocity of a set of atoms. Useful to obtain histograms of atom speeds.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getData

        public IData getData()
        Returns the rms velocity of the atoms given by the iterator. Value is given in the first element of the array, which is always of dimension 1.
        Specified by:
        getData in interface IDataSource
        Returns:
        the data given by this source

      • setupData

        protected void setupData()
        Creates the data object (a DataFunction) to be returned by getData(). data wraps the histogram's double[] so copying is not needed.
